Name: Rogue Slash
About the game: Rogue Slash is a combination of original roguelike rules with isometric hack & slash gameplay . 4 characters with a different playstyle, 8 levels and one rule - if you die then you start from the beginning. - 4 different graphic styles, - 4 different characters, - level generation system, - improved stronger versions of characters to unlock, - 12 different types of melee and ranged AI, - randomly generated quests, - randomly generated encounters.
Meta Title: Rogue Slash: Nov 6, 2019, OP Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rogue Slash? Check out the release date (Nov 6, 2019), developer insights from OP Games, and a complete game summary.
